name: @oneirosoft/quiddity
description: Local-first React state helpers with mutator-style updates.

scripts.test:react18: bun add --no-save -d react@18 react-dom@18 @types/react@18 @types/react-dom@18 && bun test --preload ./test/setup.ts
scripts.test:react19: bun add --no-save -d react@19 react-dom@19 @types/react@19 @types/react-dom@19 && bun test --preload ./test/setup.ts
scripts.test:all: bun run test:react18; bun run test:react19
